story:
Family/friends/fans/strangers -

HELLO + THANK YOU for being here and supporting my music. It means THE WORLD! I wish I could personally hug you all... but #COVID-19 (ugh)..

My name is Emily Bea and I’m a singer-songwriter from Salt Lake City, Utah! I have been writing, recording and releasing music independently for the past 10 years. It has been so fun to share my songs with you and to build a following/fan base over the past several years. And I just want to THANK YOU from bottom of my heart for your continued love and support in my music. It truly means so much and I honestly could not do what I do without you.

It has been a minute since I have released an album… And mostly that is due to growing up, getting married and having just a few (a lot... hehe) of grown up expenses to pay for. BUT I am so excited to announce the release of a brand new album titled, "Coming Back Home" to be released fall/winter 2020. 

ABOUT THE ALBUM:

As a songwriter, a lot of my inspiration comes from my relationships and the people I hold close to my heart. That sparked from a young age and more specifically when I was 16 years old visiting with my darling great-grandmother, Lila. While visiting with her with asked her to share the story of how she met my great grandpa (which we recorded on video! See my insta for the video) and after hearing that cutest love story a desire was ignited to write a special song in honor of them... which is now known as “Forever With You” – a song I released in 2018 which will also be included on this album... AND a special piano version as well!

This new album is so special to me, probably my favorite yet, because it is a HOME themed album where every single song is about my home and the people I’ve shared it with. It is filled with songs about love, childhood, growing up, family, loss… all things I feel we experience in life. And I hope that as you listen to this album you will feel a bit of nostalgia and a piece of your personal home too.

COSTS:

One thing a lot of people don’t realize is that independent artists don’t have the financial backing of major labels. So all of the expenses that come with releasing music come out of our own pocket.

I am doing this campaign in hopes to receive some help with the expenses of making/releasing this album and in return I have created some fun perks for you to receive as you donate/contribute to this campaign!

GAME PLAN:

In order to fund this album I have a budget of $12,000+. This includes:

  • Recording costs - roughly $1,000/song
  • Distribution/physical CD costs
  • Marketing/promotion costs
  • Album photography and videography
  • Merchandise
  • INDIEGOGO + Payment/Processing Fees
  • SO MUCH MORE!

If we do exceed the $12,000 (or if I don't end up using the funds raised!) I will, of course, save for future music releases or use additional funds towards more perks for YOU!

HOW CAN YOU HELP?

The best way to help me out would be to donate/contribute to this campaign! But I understand that some may not have the financial means to do so... but YOU CAN STILL HELP! Here are all the ways you can help this campaign:

  • Donate or contribute for a perk!
  • If one of the perks is out of your budget, team up with family/friends to split the costs and share the perk! 
  • SPREAD THE WORD! Share with your family/friends
  • Share this campaign on your Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, ALL THE PLACES! (be sure to use the Indiegogo share tools!)
  • Follow me on Instagram/Twitter/Facebook (@emilybeamusic) and be sure to tag me when you share! 
  • Follow me on Spotify - https://open.spotify.com/artist/0tatTzAtisopJgw...

 

THANK YOU THANK YOU THANK YOU!

THANK YOU again for the love and support! I cannot wait for you guys to hear these songs! <3

 

-Emily Bea
story_txt:
Family/friends/fans/strangers -
HELLO + THANK YOU for being here and supporting my music. It means THE WORLD! I wish I could personally hug you all... but #COVID-19 (ugh)..
My name is Emily Bea and I’m a singer-songwriter from Salt Lake City, Utah! I have been writing, recording and releasing music independently for the past 10 years. It has been so fun to share my songs with you and to build a following/fan base over the past several years. And I just want to THANK YOU from bottom of my heart for your continued love and support in my music. It truly means so much and I honestly could not do what I do without you.
It has been a minute since I have released an album… And mostly that is due to growing up, getting married and having just a few (a lot... hehe) of grown up expenses to pay for. BUT I am so excited to announce the release of a brand new album titled, "Coming Back Home" to be released fall/winter 2020. 
ABOUT THE ALBUM:
As a songwriter, a lot of my inspiration comes from my relationships and the people I hold close to my heart. That sparked from a young age and more specifically when I was 16 years old visiting with my darling great-grandmother, Lila. While visiting with her with asked her to share the story of how she met my great grandpa (which we recorded on video! See my insta for the video) and after hearing that cutest love story a desire was ignited to write a special song in honor of them... which is now known as “Forever With You” – a song I released in 2018 which will also be included on this album... AND a special piano version as well!
This new album is so special to me, probably my favorite yet, because it is a HOME themed album where every single song is about my home and the people I’ve shared it with. It is filled with songs about love, childhood, growing up, family, loss… all things I feel we experience in life. And I hope that as you listen to this album you will feel a bit of nostalgia and a piece of your personal home too.

COSTS:
One thing a lot of people don’t realize is that independent artists don’t have the financial backing of major labels. So all of the expenses that come with releasing music come out of our own pocket.
I am doing this campaign in hopes to receive some help with the expenses of making/releasing this album and in return I have created some fun perks for you to receive as you donate/contribute to this campaign!
GAME PLAN:
In order to fund this album I have a budget of $12,000+. This includes:

Recording costs - roughly $1,000/song
Distribution/physical CD costs
Marketing/promotion costs
Album photography and videography
Merchandise
INDIEGOGO + Payment/Processing Fees
SO MUCH MORE!

If we do exceed the $12,000 (or if I don't end up using the funds raised!) I will, of course, save for future music releases or use additional funds towards more perks for YOU!
HOW CAN YOU HELP?
The best way to help me out would be to donate/contribute to this campaign! But I understand that some may not have the financial means to do so... but YOU CAN STILL HELP! Here are all the ways you can help this campaign:

Donate or contribute for a perk!
If one of the perks is out of your budget, team up with family/friends to split the costs and share the perk! 

SPREAD THE WORD! Share with your family/friends
Share this campaign on your Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, ALL THE PLACES! (be sure to use the Indiegogo share tools!)
Follow me on Instagram/Twitter/Facebook (@emilybeamusic) and be sure to tag me when you share! 
Follow me on Spotify - https://open.spotify.com/artist/0tatTzAtisopJgw...


 
THANK YOU THANK YOU THANK YOU!
THANK YOU again for the love and support! I cannot wait for you guys to hear these songs! <3
 
-Emily Bea

story:
57 minutes of Galactic Space Metal \m/ 

The debut album will include 10 original songs, Instrumental / Orchestral versions are available also.

  • Drummers recorded by 66Samus 
  • Vocals recorded Evgen Zoidze 
  • Everything else recorded by Luke Robinson

Bundles available!

They will be number of bundles to choose from!

  • CD's, T-shirts, Digital Downloads
  • Instrumental / Orchestral Versions
  • Isolation Tracks
  • Meet Luke on SKYPE! 
  • Hire Luke as guest guitar soloist on your song!

Goal #1 - £1,000

Goal #2 - £5,000

The goal of this campaign is to: 

  • Help manufacture the CD's 
  • Print the T-shirts
  • Market the album and press release
  • £5,000 will recoup the cost of making the album

Why Crowdfund?

As a solo artist it took 3 years to financially fund the album. 
If we recouped the cost album #2 would come along in the next 12 - 18 months!
The main goal (£1,000) is help fund the cost of releasing the album to the world!
